p: The caffeic acid standard was purchased from Desite (Industries Ltd., Chengdu, China). The rosmarinic acid standards were purchased from SenBeiJia Biological Technology Co., Ltd. (Nanjing, China). The perillaketone standard was purchased from TLC (TLC Pharmaceutical Standards Ltd., Newmarket, Ontario, Canada). The isoegomaketone standard was purchased from CFWLABS (CFW Laboratories, Inc., Newark, DE, USA).
